31 #include "base_nodelet.h"

33 using namespace cv;
34 using namespace std;
35 
36 PLUGINLIB_EXPORT_CLASS(realsense_camera::BaseNodelet, nodelet::Nodelet)
37 namespace realsense_camera
38 {
39 /*
40  * Public Methods.
41  */
42 BaseNodelet::~BaseNodelet()
43 {
44  stream_thread_->join();
45 
46  if (enable_tf_ == true)
47  {
48  transform_thread_->join();
49  }
50 
51  // Stop device.
52  if (is_device_started_ == true)
53  {
54  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Stopping camera");
55  rs_stop_device(rs_device_, 0);
56  rs_delete_context(rs_context_, &rs_error_);
57  checkError();
58  }
59 
60  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Stopping...");
61  ros::shutdown();
62 }
63 
64 /*
65  * Initialize the realsense camera
66  */
67 void BaseNodelet::onInit()
68 {
69  // Set default configurations.
70  is_device_started_ = false;
71 
72  for (int i = 0; i < num_streams_; ++i)
73  {
74  camera_info_ptr_[i] = NULL;
75  stream_ts_[i] = -1;
76  }
77 
78  setStreamOptions();
79 
80  /*if (enable_depth_ == false && enable_color_ == false)
81  {
82  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - None of the streams are enabled. Exiting!");
83  ros::shutdown();
84  }*/
85 
86  // Advertise the various topics and services.
87  image_transport::ImageTransport it(nh_);
88  camera_publisher_[RS_STREAM_COLOR] = it.advertiseCamera(COLOR_TOPIC, 1);
89  camera_publisher_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] = it.advertiseCamera(DEPTH_TOPIC, 1);
90  camera_publisher_[RS_STREAM_INFRARED] = it.advertiseCamera(IR_TOPIC, 1);
91 
92  pointcloud_publisher_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>(PC_TOPIC, 1);
93 
94  get_options_service_ = nh_.advertiseService(SETTINGS_SERVICE, &BaseNodelet::getCameraOptionValues, this);
95 
96  // Poll for camera and connect if found
97  while (!connectToCamera())
98  {
99  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Sleeping 5 seconds then retrying to connect");
100  ros::Duration(5).sleep();
101  }
102 
103  // Start working thread.
104  stream_thread_ = boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread>(new boost::thread(boost::bind(&BaseNodelet::publishStreams, this)));
105 
106  if (enable_tf_ == true)
107  {
108  transform_thread_ =
109  boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread>(new boost::thread(boost::bind(&BaseNodelet::publishTransforms, this)));
110  }
111 }
112 
113 /*
114  *Protected Methods.
115  */
116 void BaseNodelet::enableStream(rs_stream stream_index, int width, int height, rs_format format, int fps)
117 {
118  std::string stream_mode;
119  pnh_.param("mode", stream_mode, DEFAULT_MODE);
120 
121  // Enable streams.
122  if (stream_mode.compare("manual") == 0)
123  {
124  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Enabling " << STREAM_DESC[stream_index] << " stream: manual mode");
125  rs_enable_stream(rs_device_, stream_index, width, height, format, fps, &rs_error_);
126  checkError();
127  }
128  else
129  {
130  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Enabling " << STREAM_DESC[stream_index] << " stream: preset mode");
131  rs_enable_stream_preset(rs_device_, stream_index, RS_PRESET_BEST_QUALITY, &rs_error_);
132  checkError();
133  }
134 
135  if (camera_info_ptr_[stream_index] == NULL)
136  {
137  prepareStreamCalibData(stream_index);
138  }
139 }
140 
141 void BaseNodelet::disableStream(rs_stream stream_index)
142 {
143  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Disabling " << STREAM_DESC[stream_index] << " stream");
144  rs_disable_stream(rs_device_, stream_index, &rs_error_);
145  checkError();
146 }
147 
148 void BaseNodelet::checkError()
149 {
150  if (rs_error_)
151  {
152  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Error calling " << rs_get_failed_function(rs_error_) << " ( "
153  << rs_get_failed_args(rs_error_) << " ): \n" << rs_get_error_message(rs_error_)
154  << " \n");
155  rs_free_error(rs_error_);
156 
157  ros::shutdown();
158 
159  exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
160  }
161 }
162 
163 bool BaseNodelet::connectToCamera()
164 {
165  std::string serial_no;
166  std::string usb_port_id;
167 
168  rs_context_ = rs_create_context(RS_API_VERSION, &rs_error_);
169  checkError();
170 
171  int num_of_cameras = rs_get_device_count(rs_context_, &rs_error_);
172  checkError();
173 
174  // Exit with error if no cameras are connected.
175  if (num_of_cameras < 1)
176  {
177  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - No cameras detected!");
178  rs_delete_context(rs_context_, &rs_error_);
179  checkError();
180  return false;
181  }
182 
183  // Print list of all cameras found
184  listCameras(num_of_cameras);
185 
186  pnh_.getParam("serial_no", serial_no);
187  pnh_.getParam("usb_port_id", usb_port_id);
188 
189  // Exit with error if no serial number or usb_port_id is specified and multiple cameras are detected.
190  if (serial_no.empty() && usb_port_id.empty() && num_of_cameras > 1)
191  {
192  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Multiple cameras detected but no input serial_no or usb_port_id specified");
193  rs_delete_context(rs_context_, &rs_error_);
194  checkError();
195  return false;
196  }
197 
198  // init rs_device_ before starting loop
199  rs_device_ = nullptr;
200 
201  // find camera
202  for (int i = 0; i < num_of_cameras; i++)
203  {
204  rs_device *rs_detected_device = rs_get_device(rs_context_, i, &rs_error_);
205 
206  // check serial_no and usb_port_id
207  if ((serial_no.empty() || serial_no == rs_get_device_serial(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_)) &&
208  (usb_port_id.empty() || usb_port_id == rs_get_device_usb_port_id(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_)))
209  {
210  // device found
211  rs_device_ = rs_detected_device;
212  }
213  // continue loop
214  }
215 
216  if (rs_device_ == nullptr)
217  {
218  // camera not found
219  string error_msg = " - Couldn't find camera to connect with ";
220  error_msg += "serial_no = " + serial_no + ", ";
221  error_msg += "usb_port_id = " + usb_port_id;
222 
223  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << error_msg);
224 
225  rs_delete_context(rs_context_, &rs_error_);
226  checkError();
227  return false;
228  }
229 
230  // print device info
231  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Connecting to camera with Serial No: "
232  << rs_get_device_serial(rs_device_, &rs_error_)
233  << " USB Port ID: " << rs_get_device_usb_port_id(rs_device_, &rs_error_));
234  checkError();
235 
236  // Enable streams.
237  if (enable_color_ == true)
238  {
239  enableStream(RS_STREAM_COLOR, width_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], height_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], COLOR_FORMAT,
240  fps_[RS_STREAM_COLOR]);
241  }
242  if (enable_depth_ == true)
243  {
244  enableStream(RS_STREAM_DEPTH, width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEPTH_FORMAT,
245  fps_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH]);
246  }
247  enableStream(RS_STREAM_INFRARED, width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], IR_FORMAT, fps_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH]);
248  getCameraOptions();
249  setStaticCameraOptions();
250 
251  // Start device.
252  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Starting camera");
253  rs_start_device(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
254  checkError();
255 
256  is_device_started_ = true;
257 
258  allocateResources();
259 
260  return true;
261 }
262 
263 void BaseNodelet::listCameras(int num_of_cameras)
264 {
265  // print list of detected cameras
266  std::string detected_camera_msg = " - Detected the following cameras:";
267  for (int i = 0; i < num_of_cameras; i++)
268  {
269  // get device
270  rs_device *rs_detected_device = rs_get_device(rs_context_, i, &rs_error_);
271 
272  // print device details
273  detected_camera_msg = detected_camera_msg + "\n\t\t\t\t- Serial No: " +
274  rs_get_device_serial(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_) + "; Firmware: " +
275  rs_get_device_firmware_version(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_) + "; Name: " +
276  rs_get_device_name(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_) + "; USB Port ID: " +
277  rs_get_device_usb_port_id(rs_detected_device, &rs_error_);
278  checkError();
279  }
280  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ + detected_camera_msg);
281 }
282 
283 /*
284  * Gets the options supported by the camera along with their min, max and step values.
285  */
286 void BaseNodelet::getCameraOptions()
287 {
288  for (int i = 0; i < RS_OPTION_COUNT; ++i)
289  {
290  CameraOptions o = { (rs_option)i };
291 
292  if (rs_device_supports_option(rs_device_, o.opt, &rs_error_))
293  {
294  rs_get_device_option_range(rs_device_, o.opt, &o.min, &o.max, &o.step, 0);
295 
296  // Skip the camera options where min and max values are the same.
297  if (o.min != o.max)
298  {
299  o.value = rs_get_device_option(rs_device_, o.opt, 0);
300  camera_options_.push_back(o);
301  }
302  }
303  }
304 }
305 
306 /*
307  * Define buffer for images and prepare camera info for each enabled stream.
308  */
309 void BaseNodelet::allocateResources()
310 {
311  // Prepare camera for enabled streams (color/depth/infrared)
312  fillStreamEncoding();
313 
314  image_[RS_STREAM_COLOR] = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], width_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], CV_8UC3, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 0));
315  image_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], CV_16UC1, cv::Scalar(0));
316  image_[RS_STREAM_INFRARED] = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], CV_8UC3, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 0));
317  ir_img_[0] = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], CV_8UC1, cv::Scalar(0));
318  ir_img_[1] = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], CV_8UC1, cv::Scalar(0));
319 }
320 
321 /*
322  * Prepare camera_info for each enabled stream.
323  */
324 void BaseNodelet::prepareStreamCalibData(rs_stream stream_index)
325 {
326  rs_intrinsics intrinsic;
327  rs_get_stream_intrinsics(rs_device_, stream_index, &intrinsic, &rs_error_);
328  checkError();
329 
330  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo *camera_info = new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo();
331  camera_info_ptr_[stream_index] = sensor_msgs::CameraInfoPtr(camera_info);
332 
333  camera_info->header.frame_id = frame_id_[stream_index];
334  camera_info->width = intrinsic.width;
335  camera_info->height = intrinsic.height;
336 
337  camera_info->K.at(0) = intrinsic.fx;
338  camera_info->K.at(2) = intrinsic.ppx;
339  camera_info->K.at(4) = intrinsic.fy;
340  camera_info->K.at(5) = intrinsic.ppy;
341  camera_info->K.at(8) = 1;
342 
343  camera_info->P.at(0) = camera_info->K.at(0);
344  camera_info->P.at(1) = 0;
345  camera_info->P.at(2) = camera_info->K.at(2);
346  camera_info->P.at(3) = 0;
347 
348  camera_info->P.at(4) = 0;
349  camera_info->P.at(5) = camera_info->K.at(4);
350  camera_info->P.at(6) = camera_info->K.at(5);
351  camera_info->P.at(7) = 0;
352 
353  camera_info->P.at(8) = 0;
354  camera_info->P.at(9) = 0;
355  camera_info->P.at(10) = 1;
356  camera_info->P.at(11) = 0;
357 
358  if (stream_index == RS_STREAM_DEPTH)
359  {
360  // set depth to color translation values in Projection matrix (P)
361  rs_extrinsics z_extrinsic;
362  rs_get_device_extrinsics(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, RS_STREAM_COLOR, &z_extrinsic, &rs_error_);
363  checkError();
364  camera_info->P.at(3) = z_extrinsic.translation[0]; // Tx
365  camera_info->P.at(7) = z_extrinsic.translation[1]; // Ty
366  camera_info->P.at(11) = z_extrinsic.translation[2]; // Tz
367  }
368 
369  camera_info->distortion_model = "plumb_bob";
370 
371  // set R (rotation matrix) values to identity matrix
372  camera_info->R.at(0) = (double)1;
373  camera_info->R.at(1) = (double)0;
374  camera_info->R.at(2) = (double)0;
375  camera_info->R.at(3) = (double)0;
376  camera_info->R.at(4) = (double)1;
377  camera_info->R.at(5) = (double)0;
378  camera_info->R.at(6) = (double)0;
379  camera_info->R.at(7) = (double)0;
380  camera_info->R.at(8) = (double)1;
381 
382  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++)
383  {
384  camera_info->D.push_back(intrinsic.coeffs[i]);
385  }
386 }
387 
388 /*
389  * Get the latest values of the camera options.
390  */
391 bool BaseNodelet::getCameraOptionValues(realsense_camera::cameraConfiguration::Request &req,
392  realsense_camera::cameraConfiguration::Response &res)
393 {
394  std::string get_options_result_str;
395  std::string opt_name, opt_value;
396 
397  for (CameraOptions o : camera_options_)
398  {
399  opt_name = rs_option_to_string(o.opt);
400  std::transform(opt_name.begin(), opt_name.end(), opt_name.begin(), ::tolower);
401  o.value = rs_get_device_option(rs_device_, o.opt, 0);
402  opt_value = boost::lexical_cast<std::string>(o.value);
403  get_options_result_str += opt_name + ":" + opt_value + ";";
404  }
405 
406  res.configuration_str = get_options_result_str;
407  return true;
408 }
409 
410 /*
411  * Set the stream options based on input params.
412  */
413 void BaseNodelet::setStreamOptions()
414 {
415  pnh_.param("enable_depth", enable_depth_, ENABLE_DEPTH);
416  pnh_.param("enable_color", enable_color_, ENABLE_COLOR);
417  pnh_.param("enable_pointcloud", enable_pointcloud_, ENABLE_PC);
418  pnh_.param("enable_tf", enable_tf_, ENABLE_TF);
419  pnh_.param("depth_width", width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEPTH_WIDTH);
420  pnh_.param("depth_height", height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEPTH_HEIGHT);
421  pnh_.param("color_width", width_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], COLOR_WIDTH);
422  pnh_.param("color_height", height_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], COLOR_HEIGHT);
423  pnh_.param("depth_fps", fps_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEPTH_FPS);
424  pnh_.param("color_fps", fps_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], COLOR_FPS);
425  pnh_.param("depth_optical_frame_id", frame_id_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEFAULT_DEPTH_OPTICAL_FRAME_ID);
426  pnh_.param("color_optical_frame_id", frame_id_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], DEFAULT_COLOR_OPTICAL_FRAME_ID);
427  pnh_.param("ir_frame_id", frame_id_[RS_STREAM_INFRARED], DEFAULT_IR_FRAME_ID);
428 }
429 
430 /*
431  * Copy frame data from realsense to member cv images.
432  */
433 void BaseNodelet::prepareStreamData(rs_stream rs_strm)
434 {
435  if (rs_strm == RS_STREAM_DEPTH)
436  {
437  // fill depth buffer
438  image_depth16_ = reinterpret_cast<const uint16_t *>(rs_get_frame_data(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, 0));
439  }
440  // fill image buffer for stream
441  if (rs_strm == RS_STREAM_INFRARED || rs_strm == RS_STREAM_INFRARED2)
442  {
443  // ROS_WARN("Reached IR %d", rs_strm);
444  cv::Mat temp3C = cv::Mat(height_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], width_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], CV_8UC3, cv::Scalar(0, 0, 0));
445  ir_img_[(uint32_t)rs_strm - RS_STREAM_INFRARED].data = (unsigned char *)(rs_get_frame_data(rs_device_, rs_strm, 0));
446  cvtColor(ir_img_[(uint32_t)(rs_strm == RS_STREAM_INFRARED ? 0 : 1)], image_[(uint32_t)rs_strm], CV_GRAY2RGB);
447  // ROS_WARN("Succeeded IR %d", rs_strm);
448  }
449  else
450  {
451  image_[(uint32_t)rs_strm].data = (unsigned char *)(rs_get_frame_data(rs_device_, rs_strm, 0));
452  }
453 }
454 
455 /*
456  * Populate the encodings for each stream.
457  */
458 void BaseNodelet::fillStreamEncoding()
459 {
460  stream_encoding_[RS_STREAM_COLOR] = "rgb8";
461  stream_step_[RS_STREAM_COLOR] = width_[RS_STREAM_COLOR] * sizeof(unsigned char) * 3;
462  stream_encoding_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::TYPE_16UC1;
463  stream_step_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] = width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] * sizeof(uint16_t);
464  stream_encoding_[RS_STREAM_INFRARED] = "rgb8";
465  stream_step_[RS_STREAM_INFRARED] = width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH] * sizeof(unsigned char) * 3;
466 }
467 
468 /*
469  * Publish streams.
470  */
471 void BaseNodelet::publishStreams()
472 {
473  while (ros::ok())
474  {
475  if (enable_depth_ == false && rs_is_stream_enabled(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, 0) == 1)
476  {
477  if (rs_is_device_streaming(rs_device_, 0) == 1)
478  {
479  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Stopping camera");
480  rs_stop_device(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
481  checkError();
482  }
483 
484  // disable Depth and IR stream
485  disableStream(RS_STREAM_DEPTH);
486  disableStream(RS_STREAM_INFRARED);
487 
488  if (rs_is_device_streaming(rs_device_, 0) == 0)
489  {
490  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Starting camera");
491  rs_start_device(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
492  checkError();
493  }
494  }
495 
496  if (enable_depth_ == true && rs_is_stream_enabled(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, 0) == 0)
497  {
498  if (rs_is_device_streaming(rs_device_, 0) == 1)
499  {
500  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Stopping camera");
501  rs_stop_device(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
502  checkError();
503  }
504 
505  enableStream(RS_STREAM_DEPTH, width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], DEPTH_FORMAT,
506  fps_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH]);
507  enableStream(RS_STREAM_INFRARED, width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH], IR_FORMAT,
508  fps_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH]);
509 
510  if (rs_is_device_streaming(rs_device_, 0) == 0)
511  {
512  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Starting camera");
513  rs_start_device(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
514  checkError();
515  }
516  }
517 
518  if (rs_is_device_streaming(rs_device_, 0) == 1)
519  {
520  rs_wait_for_frames(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
521  checkError();
522 
523  ros::Time time_stamp = ros::Time::now();
524  bool duplicate_depth_color = false;
525 
526  for (int stream_index = 0; stream_index < num_streams_; ++stream_index)
527  {
528  // Publish image stream only if there is at least one subscriber.
529  if (camera_publisher_[stream_index].getNumSubscribers() > 0 &&
530  rs_is_stream_enabled(rs_device_, (rs_stream)stream_index, 0) == 1)
531  {
532  int current_ts = rs_get_frame_timestamp(rs_device_, (rs_stream)stream_index, 0);
533  if (stream_ts_[stream_index] != current_ts) // Publish frames only if its not duplicate
534  {
535  prepareStreamData((rs_stream)stream_index);
536 
537  sensor_msgs::ImagePtr msg = cv_bridge::CvImage(std_msgs::Header(), stream_encoding_[stream_index],
538  image_[stream_index]).toImageMsg();
539 
540  msg->header.frame_id = frame_id_[stream_index];
541  msg->header.stamp = time_stamp; // Publish timestamp to synchronize frames.
542  msg->width = image_[stream_index].cols;
543  msg->height = image_[stream_index].rows;
544  msg->is_bigendian = false;
545  msg->step = stream_step_[stream_index];
546 
547  camera_info_ptr_[stream_index]->header.stamp = msg->header.stamp;
548  camera_publisher_[stream_index].publish(msg, camera_info_ptr_[stream_index]);
549  }
550  else
551  {
552  if ((stream_index == RS_STREAM_DEPTH) || (stream_index == RS_STREAM_COLOR))
553  {
554  duplicate_depth_color = true; // Set this flag to true if Depth and/or Color frame is duplicate
555  }
556  }
557  stream_ts_[stream_index] = current_ts;
558  }
559  }
560 
561  if (pointcloud_publisher_.getNumSubscribers() > 0 && rs_is_stream_enabled(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, 0) == 1 &&
562  enable_pointcloud_ == true &&
563  (duplicate_depth_color == false)) // Skip publishing PointCloud if Depth and/or Color frame was duplicate
564  {
565  if (camera_publisher_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH].getNumSubscribers() <= 0)
566  {
567  prepareStreamData(RS_STREAM_DEPTH);
568  }
569  if (camera_publisher_[RS_STREAM_COLOR].getNumSubscribers() <= 0)
570  {
571  prepareStreamData(RS_STREAM_COLOR);
572  }
573  publishPointCloud(image_[RS_STREAM_COLOR], time_stamp);
574  }
575  }
576  }
577 }
578 
579 /*
580  * Publish pointcloud.
581  */
582 void BaseNodelet::publishPointCloud(cv::Mat &image_color, ros::Time time_stamp)
583 {
584  // Publish pointcloud only if there is at least one subscriber.
585  if (pointcloud_publisher_.getNumSubscribers() > 0)
586  {
587  rs_intrinsics color_intrinsic;
588  rs_extrinsics z_extrinsic;
589 
590  rs_intrinsics z_intrinsic;
591  rs_get_stream_intrinsics(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, &z_intrinsic, &rs_error_);
592  checkError();
593 
594  if (enable_color_ == true)
595  {
596  rs_get_stream_intrinsics(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_COLOR, &color_intrinsic, &rs_error_);
597  checkError();
598  rs_get_device_extrinsics(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, RS_STREAM_COLOR, &z_extrinsic, &rs_error_);
599  checkError();
600  }
601 
602  // Convert pointcloud from the camera to pointcloud object for ROS.
603  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 msg_pointcloud;
604  msg_pointcloud.width = width_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH];
605  msg_pointcloud.height = height_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH];
606  msg_pointcloud.header.stamp = time_stamp;
607  msg_pointcloud.is_dense = true;
608 
609  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Modifier modifier(msg_pointcloud);
610 
611  modifier.setPointCloud2Fields(4, "x", 1, sensor_msgs::PointField::FLOAT32, "y", 1, sensor_msgs::PointField::FLOAT32,
612  "z", 1, sensor_msgs::PointField::FLOAT32, "rgb", 1, sensor_msgs::PointField::FLOAT32);
613 
614  modifier.setPointCloud2FieldsByString(2, "xyz", "rgb");
615 
616  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_x(msg_pointcloud, "x");
617  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_y(msg_pointcloud, "y");
618  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<float> iter_z(msg_pointcloud, "z");
619 
620  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<uint8_t> iter_r(msg_pointcloud, "r");
621  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<uint8_t> iter_g(msg_pointcloud, "g");
622  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2Iterator<uint8_t> iter_b(msg_pointcloud, "b");
623 
624  float depth_point[3], color_point[3], color_pixel[2], scaled_depth;
625  unsigned char *color_data = image_color.data;
626  const float depth_scale = rs_get_device_depth_scale(rs_device_, &rs_error_);
627  checkError(); // Default value is 0.001
628 
629  // Fill the PointCloud2 fields.
630  for (int y = 0; y < z_intrinsic.height; y++)
631  {
632  for (int x = 0; x < z_intrinsic.width; x++)
633  {
634  scaled_depth = ((float)*image_depth16_) * depth_scale;
635  float depth_pixel[2] = { (float)x, (float)y };
636  rs_deproject_pixel_to_point(depth_point, &z_intrinsic, depth_pixel, scaled_depth);
637 
638  if (depth_point[2] <= 0 || depth_point[2] > max_z_)
639  {
640  depth_point[0] = 0;
641  depth_point[1] = 0;
642  depth_point[2] = 0;
643  }
644 
645  *iter_x = depth_point[0];
646  *iter_y = depth_point[1];
647  *iter_z = depth_point[2];
648 
649  // Default to white color.
650  *iter_r = (uint8_t)255;
651  *iter_g = (uint8_t)255;
652  *iter_b = (uint8_t)255;
653 
654  if (enable_color_ == true)
655  {
656  rs_transform_point_to_point(color_point, &z_extrinsic, depth_point);
657  rs_project_point_to_pixel(color_pixel, &color_intrinsic, color_point);
658 
659  if (color_pixel[1] < 0 || color_pixel[1] > image_color.rows || color_pixel[0] < 0 ||
660  color_pixel[0] > image_color.cols)
661  {
662  // For out of bounds color data, default to a shade of blue in order to visually distinguish holes.
663  // This color value is same as the librealsense out of bounds color value.
664  *iter_r = 96;
665  *iter_g = 157;
666  *iter_b = 198;
667  }
668  else
669  {
670  int i = (int)color_pixel[0];
671  int j = (int)color_pixel[1];
672 
673  *iter_r = (uint8_t)color_data[i * 3 + j * image_color.cols * 3];
674  *iter_g = (uint8_t)color_data[i * 3 + j * image_color.cols * 3 + 1];
675  *iter_b = (uint8_t)color_data[i * 3 + j * image_color.cols * 3 + 2];
676  }
677  }
678 
679  image_depth16_++;
680  ++iter_x;
681  ++iter_y;
682  ++iter_z;
683  ++iter_r;
684  ++iter_g;
685  ++iter_b;
686  }
687  }
688 
689  msg_pointcloud.header.frame_id = frame_id_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH];
690  pointcloud_publisher_.publish(msg_pointcloud);
691  }
692 }
693 /*
694  * Publish camera transforms
695  */
696 void BaseNodelet::publishTransforms()
697 {
698  // publish transforms for the cameras
699  ROS_INFO_STREAM(nodelet_name_ << " - Publishing camera transforms");
700  tf::Transform tr;
701  tf::Quaternion q;
702  tf::TransformBroadcaster tf_broadcaster;
703  rs_extrinsics z_extrinsic;
704 
705  // extrinsics are offsets between the cameras
706  rs_get_device_extrinsics(rs_device_, RS_STREAM_DEPTH, RS_STREAM_COLOR, &z_extrinsic, &rs_error_);
707  checkError();
708 
709  std::string base_frame_id;
710  std::string color_frame_id;
711  std::string depth_frame_id;
712  pnh_.param("base_frame_id", base_frame_id, DEFAULT_BASE_FRAME_ID);
713  pnh_.param("color_frame_id", color_frame_id, DEFAULT_COLOR_FRAME_ID);
714  pnh_.param("depth_frame_id", depth_frame_id, DEFAULT_DEPTH_FRAME_ID);
715 
716  ros::Duration sleeper(0.1); // 100ms
717 
718  while (ros::ok())
719  {
720  // time stamp is future dated to be valid for given duration
721  ros::Time time_stamp = ros::Time::now() + sleeper;
722 
723  // transform base frame to depth frame
724  tr.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(z_extrinsic.translation[2], -z_extrinsic.translation[0], -z_extrinsic.translation[1]));
725  tr.setRotation(tf::Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1));
726  tf_broadcaster.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr, time_stamp, base_frame_id, depth_frame_id));
727 
728  // transform depth frame to depth optical frame
729  tr.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
730  q.setEuler(M_PI / 2, 0.0, -M_PI / 2);
731  tr.setRotation(q);
732  tf_broadcaster.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr, time_stamp, depth_frame_id, frame_id_[RS_STREAM_DEPTH]));
733 
734  // transform base frame to color frame (these are the same)
735  tr.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
736  tr.setRotation(tf::Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1));
737  tf_broadcaster.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr, time_stamp, base_frame_id, color_frame_id));
738 
739  // transform color frame to color optical frame
740  tr.setOrigin(tf::Vector3(0, 0, 0));
741  q.setEuler(M_PI / 2, 0.0, -M_PI / 2);
742  tr.setRotation(q);
743  tf_broadcaster.sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(tr, time_stamp, color_frame_id, frame_id_[RS_STREAM_COLOR]));
744 
745  sleeper.sleep(); // need sleep or transform won't publish correctly
746  }
747 }
748 } // end namespace
